name: 黃啟梧
objective: 因應高齡化社會的來臨，本課程探討高齡者的健康、住家、行動力、通訊、休閒和工作等議題，以使用者為中心發掘問題，提出改善高齡者生活之產品、環境或服務設計，以達到在地安養的目的。
schedule:
1.　　Toward better design for older adults
2.　　Characteristics of older adult users
3.　　Guiding the design process
4.　　Improving perception of information
5.　　Design of input and output devices
6.　　Interface design
7.　　Design of training and instructional programs
8.　　Making the work environment age-friendly
9.　　Maximizing the usefulness and usability of healthcare technologies
10.　　Transportation
11.　　Designing accommodations for aging in-place
12.　　Involving older adults in research and usability studies
13.　　Conducting focus groups with older adults
14.　　Statistical considerations in usability testing
15.　　Task analysis and error prediction
16.　　GOMS modeling for older adults
17.　　Multimedia design
18.　　 Synthesis and comments
scorePolicy:
報告  30%
討論  30%
出席  40%
materials: Fisk, A. D., Rogers, W. A., Charness, N., Czaja, S. J. amd Sharit, J. (2009) Designing for Older Adults (2nd ed.). CRC Press. Taylor & Francis Group.
